How I work

All my projects start with an informal chat about what you would like to achieve. Afterwards I like to run a small workshop. The design process is collaborative and this workshop gives you an opportunity to tell me all about your product, service and sector. I also like to hear about the struggles, triumphs and insights gained along the way. This process ensures solutions are thoughtful, bespoke and expressive of your brand's beliefs and values.
